text:
<dc:creator xmlns:unizh="http://unizh.ch/doctypes/elements/1.0"
xmlns:dcterms="http://purl.org/dc/terms/">g.o.d</dc:creator>
        <dc:subject xmlns:unizh="http://unizh.ch/doctypes/elements/1.0"
xmlns:dcterms="http://purl.org/dc/terms/">suspect</dc:subject>

the xslt task that inserts dc terms on document creation needlessly specifies
the xml namespaces for every element
creator: gregor@apache.org
egli@apache.org
text: added dcterms to exclude-result-prefixes in addMetaData.xsl
